Key Match Events: Ecuador scored a goal via a Jamaica own goal in the 13th minute
Kendry Paez scored a penalty kick for Ecuador just before halftime
Alan Minda scored a goal for Ecuador in the 91st minute to kill off the contest
Ethan Pinnock scored a goal for Jamaica shortly after halftime
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Ecuador's first points of the tournament
Jamaica has yet to win a match in the Copa America
Others: The match was played in Las Vegas, Nevada
The top two teams from the group will progress to the quarter-finals
Jamaica must win their final group game against Venezuela to have any hope of advancing
If Mexico and Venezuela draw or Venezuela beat Mexico in their match, Jamaica will be knocked out irrespective of that result
